casebody.data:
Montier Lopez JACKSON
v.
John HERRING, Superintendent, Lanesboro Correctional Institution No. 148P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2017 Montier Jackson, for Jackson, Montier Lopez. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 16th of August 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of August 2017."

Jackson, J.recused
